card.name: Dokindante Twenty Two, Forbidden Time Hybrid King

property.name: Rules
property.value: {EX LIFE} (As you put this creature, shieldify the top card of your deck. When this creature would leave, put that shield into your graveyard instead.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, ignore any abilities of your opponent's creatures until the start of your next turn. ■ During your opponent's turn, whenever your opponent summons a creature that costs 9 or less or casts a spell that costs 9 or less, you may draw a card. Then you may cast a spell that costs 9 or less from your hand for no cost.
